name: Fertilizer prices - World Bank (2017)
title: Fertilizer prices - World Bank (2017)
description:
Fertilizer prices are measured as a real price index, where prices in 2010 are equal to 100 (2010 = 100).

Urea prices are reported in real US$ per metric ton.

sources.name: Fertilizer prices - World Bank (2017)
sources.additionalInfo:
Fertilizer prices are measured as a real price index, where prices in 2010 are equal to 100 (2010 = 100).

Urea prices are reported in real US$ per metric ton.

fields.name: Urea (World Bank (2017))
fields.description: Urea nutrient prices (in real $) per metric ton.

fields.name: Fertilizer Price Index (2010 = 100) (World Bank (2017))
fields.description: The fertiliser price index, measured relative to real prices in 2010 (where 2010=100).

fields.name: Urea Price Projection (World Bank (2017))
fields.description: Urea price projections in $ per metric ton.
